articles.description: Five months ago, Erling Haaland responded to Arsenal teenager Myles Lewis-Skelly's attempt to confront him with a dismissive: "Who are you?" The Manchester City striker knows now, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Myles Lewis-Skelly: Teenager inspires Arsenal rout over Manchester City

articles.description: Aston Villa complete the loan signing of Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Aston Villa complete loan deal for Manchester United forward

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Danny Murphy explains why Arsenal's statement win over Manchester City was a wonderfully complete performance.
articles.title: Arsenal 5-1 Man City: 'Tenacity, endeavour, composure' - how did Gunners clinch statement win?

articles.description: Meet India's latest batting superstar Abhishek Sharma, who struck a record-breaking 135 in their T20 win over England.
articles.title: India cricket: Abhishek Sharma shines in T20 win over England

articles.description: After 20 years at Manchester United, Marcus Rashford is set to leave for Aston Villa, leaving many questions and few answers.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford transfer: Manchester United to Aston Villa

articles.description: Ruben Amorim says Manchester United are "trying everything" to strengthen his squad before the transfer window closes following another home defeat – but will not repeat "the mistake of the past".
articles.title: Manchester United 'trying everything' to sign players, says Ruben Amorim

articles.description: Five-time NBA All-Star Luka Doncic joins the Los Angeles Lakers in a huge three-way trade deal.
articles.title: Luka Doncic joins Los Angeles Lakers from Dallas Mavericks in huge NBA trade deal

articles.description: In a week that could define their season, Tottenham answer their critics with a superb and resolute victory at Brentford.
articles.title: Spurs are still 'hurting', but they have found defensive strength and spirit

articles.description: England don't have the replacements to sustain their high-tempo gameplan, leaving them vulnerable to late surrenders says World Cup winner Matt Dawson.
articles.title: Matt Dawson: England's Six Nations gameplan leaves them vulnerable

articles.description: Rory McIlroy wins his first PGA Tour event of the year by claiming the Pebble Beach Pro-Am title in California.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: World number three claims two-shot win at Pebble Beach Pro-Am
